subject: Re: [junit] AssertionFailedError wat is that
msgSnippet: ... Your assertion failed. ... At a minimum, when you invoke fail(), that is a failure. Google JUnit: A Starter Guide and read it. Good luck. -- J. B.
messageBody:
Narendran wrote:

> hello guys
> i am new to this field of testing and i just got this error in the GUI of
> Junit
> the name of the error is
>
> junit.framework.AssertionFailedError
> at TestCombin.testFillLst(TestCombin.java:21)

Your assertion failed.

> wat does this error message mean
> in the line number 21 of my file i have written
>
> public void testFillLst()
> {
> ArrayList a = new ArrayList();
> a.add("aa"); a.add("bb"); a.add("cc");
> ArrayList al = combin.fillLst(a);
> assertTrue(al.isEmpty());
> fail("this is a failure");
> }

At a minimum, when you invoke fail(), that is a failure.

Google "JUnit: A Starter Guide" and read it. Good luck.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
